item.title: Checkout our new RF modules for the Giant Gecko
item.description: After a long time developing on the CC430, we are switching to a more powerful microcontroller. The CC430 is a 16 bit microcontroller and now the shift is made to a 32 bit cortex M3 from Silicon Labs. The development board that we are using is the Giant Gecko STK-3700. The CC430 is an SoC that contains a microcontroller and radio chip. The Giant Gecko is only a microcontroller and therefore we had to develop a radio module which can be plugged-in the expansion port of the Gecko starter kit.
item.dc:creator: Dragan Subotic
